Articles.Content:
Hello all i would like to say i am looking for some team members that have skype or steam i am willing to get 5

team members to join the Battledroid Space program i will try to make some kerbal skins for ingame for my team

Members that i get post comments down below with +BattledroidSpaceteam so i knoow you want to join

i will be checking in on this post soon
Welcome aboard! It seems tempting... What will we be doing? I'd prefer not to work on weapons if at all possible... I'm a pacifist Kosmonaut!

Welcome aboard! It seems tempting... What will we be doing? I'd prefer not to work on weapons if at all possible... I'm a pacifist Kosmonaut!

We focus on Astroid mineing missons and mun bases and exploreing other planets

Also grabing astroids and bringing them back to kerbin to study on
Sounds fun! +BATTLEDROIDSPACETEAM, and be sure to PM me with the details!

Hi and welcome to the forums!

It sounds cool. o: I have both steam and KSP, and are we going to play together using KMP?

PM me too, I would like to know more about it.
Woah allready got some more comments this is awsome! and i dont knoow how to PM on the forums im still farily new

Yes we will be useing KMP if its updated i dont knoow if it is but

im hopeing to get some good progress on some of the stuff im makeing flags/skins/etc

Woah allready got some more comments this is awsome! and i dont knoow how to PM on the forums im still farily new

To PM a user, you click his/her name and click view profile. Look below the "Add as friend" button. Hope this helps!

And I think KMP is updated, just used it a little while back to play LAN with my little brother.

But I haven't got the game yet, going to buy it next Tuesday.

Thanks for your help if you have have skype please do tell

becase im gonna get max and you so we can start building rockets c:

My Skype username is beneath my postcount.

But I don't have a mic at the moment.
